reviewText: this movie was f*****g HOT!!! i first saw a VCR copy of it in the '80s and it introduced me to gay porn. and to Jeff Stryker, who i just fell in love with! the king of porn in his early days at his finest! the scene in the jungle with the other two guys was the best! i think this movie turned me into a gay man! and the last scene with him and Steve Hammond also as great! i will always LOVE this movie! i don't understand at all why it was never released on DVD. and why, along with many other Jeff Stryker movies, you can't find ANYWHERE to buy them or they say the're out of print! if the companies would re-release them they'd make a fortune!!!
